headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Try Out the Declasse Stallion, Pfister Growler and Bravado Buffalo S at the LS Car Meet’s Test Track
content:
Visit the LS Car Meet’s Test Track to try out the Declasse Stallion, Pfister Growler, and a white Bravado Buffalo S, exactly like the one Franklin owns at the beginning of GTAV. Give the vehicles a spin, challenge each other to Scrambles, or race against the clock in a Time Trial, all at no personal cost.

Players can spectate the Test Track inside the LS Car Meet by heading to an exit door of the Test Track and selecting Spectate Test Track.
